title: Monday Post Show (10-25-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (10-25-21)
description:
Bobby talks about ‘the world’s hottest shot’ that’s going down on the show tomorrow. Amy talks about taking her kids out to a ‘zombie shooting range’. Bobby also talks about being in Utah over the weekend and hating the cold weather. We also update on the winner of The Draft. Bobby also takes more calls on the Alec Baldwin gun situation. Bobby makes a deal with listeners if he wins fantasy football tonight. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
